QuestData.Title: To the Depths
QuestData.Description: The Earthen Ring has identified the watery realm of Vashj'ir as a source of the adversary's destructive energies.$b$bIt is still uncertain what dangers might be faced there, so any information you could gather would be of great value.$b$bThe Alliance is sending warships to the region as we speak. To gain passage, travel northwest of Stormwind and speak to Recruiter Burns at Stormwind Harbor.$b$bMay the spirits guide you, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Recruiter Burns at Stormwind Harbor in Stormwind City.
QuestData.RewardText: All of our war ships are off fighting the Horde. You'll have to take the mercenary ship.
